name: MTLBlitPassSampleBufferAttachmentDescriptor
desc: A description of where to store GPU counter information at the start and end of a blit pass.

items.name: var sampleBuffer: MTLCounterSampleBuffer?
items.desc: The sample buffer to write new GPU counter samples to.

items.name: var startOfEncoderSampleIndex: Int
items.desc: The index the Metal device object uses to store GPU counters when starting the blit pass.

items.name: var endOfEncoderSampleIndex: Int
items.desc: The index the Metal device object uses to store GPU counters when ending the blit pass.
